mapper.sql: id as id , login as login , password as password , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , status as status , phone as phone , email as email
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mubs_adminuser ( login, password, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, phone, email ) VALUES ( #{login}, #{password}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{phone}, #{email} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

login = #{login},
password = #{password},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
WHERE id = #{id}
